page.title: 07LARGE SHOPS IN RAMSGATE
page.content: Our area took in part of the shopping area.We interviewed the managers of the 3 largest shops -Waitrose,Woolworth and Tesco. Local people said that their main shopping day was either Friday [34%] or Thursday[33%]. Bulk food shopping was done at Waitrose [40%] & Tesco [24%]. With the possibility of shops opening on Sundays, 51% liked the idea but 26% did not. None of the managers wanted Sunday opening but felt that they would have to open "if the opposition did". Computers were being used increasingly in stock ordering and checking,but none of the managers could foresee an early introduction of the new electronic tills which "read" bar-codes on goods.In addition to full-time staff,part-time shelf- fillers were needed. Best selling goods are butter, margarine, cereals, tea, coffee,biscuits and frozen foods.
